metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8359 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Google gRPC before 2017-03-29 has an out-of-bounds write caused by a heap-based use-after-free related to the grpc_call_destroy function in core/lib/surface/call.c.

criterions.comment: grpc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
